data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 3, Fernando Guerrero awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Cruz Azul.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 5, Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
Favio Alvarez for Pumas UNAM gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Fernando Guerrero awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Fernando Guerrero signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Pumas UNAM's Juan Vigon breaks free at Estadio Azteca. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
In the minute 13, The match at Estadio Azteca has been interrupted briefly for a check on Juan Dinenno, who is down injured.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
In the minute 17, Juan Dinenno for Pumas UNAM is back on the field again.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Cruz Azul.
Orbelin Pineda gets his shot on target but fails to score for Cruz Azul.
In the minute 22, Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Azteca.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Cruz Azul's Juan Escobar gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Azteca. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 24, Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cruz Azul's half?
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.
In the minute 35, Cruz Azul push forward at Estadio Azteca and Orbelin Pineda gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Pumas UNAM defence.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Fernando Guerrero awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 41, Johan Vasquez is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The away team has substituted Johan Vasquez with Gerardo Moreno. Andres Lillini is thus making his first change.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 44, Cruz Azul needs to be cautious. Pumas UNAM have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
Cruz Azul's Jonathan Rodriguez has run offside.
In the minute 45, Fernando Guerrero signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Cruz Azul's half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 45, Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio Azteca.
Fernando Guerrero has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 48, Santiago Gimenez for the home team is judged to be offside.
Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Throw-in high up the field for Pumas UNAM in Mexico City.
Cruz Azul to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
In the minute 52, Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
Orbelin Pineda scores to make it 1-0 at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Pumas UNAM make their second substitution with Carlos Gutierrez replacing Alan Mozo.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
In the minute 57, Fernando Guerrero awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Azteca.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Can Cruz Azul capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pumas UNAM's half?
In the minute 62, Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 64, Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of Cruz Azul.
In the minute 67, It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Juan Escobar for Cruz Azul drives towards goal at Estadio Azteca. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 69, Cruz Azul have been awarded a penalty...
Jonathan Rodriguez (Cruz Azul) has missed a penalty!
Cruz Azul's Jonathan Rodriguez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 71, Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
The away team replace Juan Iturbe with Facundo Waller.
In the minute 75, In Mexico City Pumas UNAM attack through Carlos Gonzalez. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
Ignacio Rivero is on a sub for Roberto Alvarado for Cruz Azul.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Azteca.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 78, Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pumas UNAM are coming forward and Favio Alvarez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
In the minute 80, Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
Fernando Guerrero awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
In the minute 83, Milton Caraglio is replacing Santiago Gimenez for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
Robert Siboldi (Cruz Azul) is making a third substitution, with Elias Hernandez replacing Orbelin Pineda.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 85, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Juan Dinenno equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
Fernando Guerrero signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Cruz Azul's half.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Mexico City.
Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Mexico City Cruz Azul attack through Ignacio Rivero. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Azteca.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
Pumas UNAM move into a 1-2 lead through a Juan Dinenno header.
